entry.title: Sunday: Sunny. High 10.

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear in the evening then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 4:34 PM EDT Saturday 8 April 2023
